name: Time Killer (PotatoNato)
description:
(NOTE FOR HTML BUILD YOU MIGHT NEED TO ZOOM OUT TO PLAY)

The objective of this game is to kill a bunch of sentient alarm clocks. Every 8 seconds, the weapon in your hand and the colours around you invert. You have to adapt to the loop in order to survive.

Controls:

Move: WASD keys/Arrow keys

Shoot/Swing: Hold/click left mouse button.

I'm going to be honest I was pretty busy for most of this jam so the final product wasn't what I was everything I hoped for. Still hope you enjoy though!
